statements: SELECT * FROM lift_and_support_metrics
SELECT item_id, lift FROM lift_and_support_metrics WHERE lift > 0.5
SELECT support, item_id FROM lift_and_support_metrics WHERE item_id = 10
SELECT transaction_id, item_id, lift FROM lift_and_support_metrics ORDER BY lift DESC
SELECT item_id, support FROM lift_and_support_metrics WHERE item_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM lift_and_support_metrics WHERE lift > 0.5 ORDER BY support DESC;
SELECT item_id, COUNT(transaction_id) as total_transactions FROM lift_and_support_metrics GROUP BY item_id HAVING total_transactions > 10 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT item_id, MAX(lift) as max_lift, MIN(support) as min_support FROM lift_and_support_metrics GROUP BY item_id;
SELECT item_id, AVG(lift) as avg_lift, AVG(support) as avg_support FROM lift_and_support_metrics GROUP BY item_id ORDER BY avg_lift DESC, avg_support DESC;
SELECT * FROM lift_and_support_metrics WHERE lift BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY item_id ASC, support DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data;
SELECT transaction_id, item_id FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT item_id, transaction_id FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM association_rules WHERE lift_metric > 0.5;
SELECT rule_id, lift_metric, support_metric FROM association_rules WHERE support_metric < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, item_id FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_id > 10 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM association_rules WHERE support_metric BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5 ORDER BY lift_metric DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transaction_data;
SELECT MAX(lift_metric) AS max_lift, MIN(support_metric) AS min_support FROM association_rules;
SELECT * FROM Lift_Support_Metrics WHERE lift_metric > 0.5
SELECT item_id, support_metric FROM Lift_Support_Metrics WHERE support_metric < 0.3
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM Items WHERE item_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT total_items FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE total_items > 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM Items WHERE item_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT transaction_id, lift_metric FROM Lift_Support_Metrics WHERE support_metric > 0.5 ORDER BY lift_metric DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM Items WHERE item_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT transaction_id, total_items FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM lift_support_metrics;
SELECT item_id, lift_metric FROM lift_support_metrics WHERE lift_metric > 0.5;
SELECT item_id, support_metric FROM lift_support_metrics ORDER BY support_metric DESC;
SELECT * FROM association_rules WHERE confidence > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM item_relationships WHERE item1_id = 1 AND support_metric < 0.4;
SELECT * FROM lift_support_metrics;
SELECT item_id, lift_metric, support_metric FROM lift_support_metrics WHERE lift_metric > 0.5;
SELECT item_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_dataset GROUP BY item_id;
SELECT rule_id, antecedent_id, consequent_id, confidence FROM association_rules WHERE confidence > 0.7 ORDER BY confidence DESC;
SELECT item1_id, item2_id, support_metric FROM item_relationships WHERE support_metric < 0.3 ORDER BY support_metric ASC;
SELECT item_id, support, lift FROM lift_support_metrics
SELECT transaction_id, item_id FROM transactions
SELECT antecedent_item_id, consequent_item_id, confidence FROM association_rules
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM items
SELECT transaction_id, items_list FROM transactions_data
SELECT item_id, support FROM lift_support_metrics WHERE support > 0.5 ORDER BY support DESC
SELECT * FROM association_rules WHERE confidence > 0.7 ORDER BY antecedent_item_id ASC, consequent_item_id DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM items WHERE item_name LIKE 'apple%'
SELECT * FROM transactions_data WHERE transaction_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT antecedent_item_id, COUNT(consequent_item_id) AS num_consequent_items FROM association_rules GROUP BY antecedent_item_id HAVING num_consequent_items > 5
